trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SEQ_00<tab>G'raha Tia has an idea on how you may proceed with your investigation.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SEQ_01<tab>As neither memories nor records of Gulool Ja's mother may exist, G'raha Tia suggests splitting up to question the greatest number of people. He and the others will ask around Solution Nine, and you will gather information by speaking with the residents of the outskirts.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SEQ_02<tab>While the people you question have no direct knowledge of the Mamool Ja you seek, their stories contain tidbits of Zoraal Ja's history that imply a larger picture with missing pieces. The best course of action would be to return to the Backroom and see if the others can help make the picture whole.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SEQ_03<tab>The collected stories of you and your comrades reveal that nearly twenty years ago, Zoraal Ja began visiting a settlement located in a region known as Yuweyawata, where he once battled and defeated a tural vidraal, together with a cadre of Landsguard─one of whom was a female Mamool Ja. This settlement may have also been the site of clandestine research, and Shale determines its location by analyzing the history of supplies sent from Everkeep. With your next destination determined, Gulool Ja is eager to set forth and learn more of his family.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SEQ_04<tab>With a glimmer of excitement in his eyes, Gulool Ja says he is ready to cross the lake. The young king will stay close behind as you cut a path through the long-forgotten facility.
※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SEQ_05<tab>Besting both feral beasts and inhuman abominations, you traverse the derelict facility, slowly uncovering its terrible purpose. At the end of your path, you come upon a storm raging over a deep canyon, and as you draw near the winds cease as a howl resounds in your ears. Breaking free from its prison, a tural vidraal descends from the skies to wreak havoc upon the land. Yet even such boundless fury is no match for you and your allies, and after a fierce battle, the beast lies broken and dying.
※In the event that you leave Yuweyawata, you may return via the driftdowns.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SEQ_06<tab>As you watch the tural vidraal breathe its final breath, the Echo imparts to you a vision of its past. In it, Zoraal Ja approves Kanilokka's proposal to experiment with the transference of human souls into bestial vessels, and after the researcher departs, Zoraal Ja is joined by a Mamool Ja woman. Addressing her as Teeshal Ja, the King of Resolve commands her to aid the project, and she accepts on one condition: that should the work bear fruit, she is permitted to take what she herself desires most of all. The vision ends on this vague note, and after you share its contents with the others, it is concluded that Teeshal Ja may be the woman you have been looking for. Emboldened by this new revelation, Gulool Ja wishes to search the facility further.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SEQ_07<tab>With the facility now devoid of threats, you are free to search for clues of Teeshal Ja's background. Gaining access to the upper floor of the observatory would be prudent at this juncture...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_TODO_00<tab>Gather information in the outskirts.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_TODO_01<tab>Report your findings to Shale in the Backroom.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Gulool Ja at the driftdowns.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_TODO_03<tab>Enter Yuweyawata Field Station.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_TODO_04<tab>Enter Yuweyawata Field Station.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Gulool Ja.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>If this is what Gulool Ja wants, then I'll help him however I can. After all, we're family!
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_005<tab>We might learn more about my father, too? I hadn't thought of that.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>I understand all too well Gulool Ja's desire. For the longest time I found my own father's actions inexplicable...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>If no records remain of Gulool Ja's mother, then where do we begin our search?
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_KRILE_000_020<tab>I can very much relate to his feelings. I pray Gulool Ja finds what he seeks.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GRAHATIA_000_030<tab>Assuming neither memories nor records of Gulool Ja's mother remain, we must cast as wide a net as possible. I suggest we split into groups.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GRAHATIA_000_031<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─if you could make inquiries outside in the outskirts, the rest of us will do the same in Solution Nine.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246A_000_100<tab>A Mamool Ja woman? Hmmm, their people have never been a common sight around here...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246A_000_101<tab>Why, the last time I saw one would have been before the dome came down over our heads.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246A_000_102<tab>She was among an entourage of Landsguard that was dispatched here. I assume they all returned to Tuliyollal after their mission.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246A_000_103<tab>But if any remained, I suppose they could've been trapped in here with the rest of us.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SYSTEM_100_103<tab>Your exchange with the chatty Shetona has taught you about “a Mamool Ja woman.”

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246A_200_103<tab>I haven't seen the Mamool Ja woman or any of the other Landsguard since then, but I suppose it's possible some of them were trapped here with the rest of us.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246B_000_104<tab>Sorry, but I've never heard of a Mamool Ja woman living in these parts, much less one connected to Zoraal Ja.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246B_000_105<tab>You might have better luck talking to the people over at a Tonawawtan settlement to the north of Everkeep, in a place called Yuweyawata.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246B_000_106<tab>The Resilient Son won their loyalty when he saved them from some crisis or another, or so the story goes. If I remember correctly, their chief's name was Kanilokka.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SYSTEM_100_106<tab>Your exchange with the middle-aged Tonawawta has taught you about “Zoraal Ja's devoted.”
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246C_000_107<tab>You're looking for a Mamool Ja woman?
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246C_000_108<tab>Oh, Gulool Ja's mother... I can't help you there, I'm afraid.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246C_000_109<tab>I only know a little about Zoraal Ja, and then only what my father told me.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246C_000_110<tab>He said that before the dome cut us off from the outside world, a tural vidraal had appeared and was terrorizing the region.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246C_000_111<tab>In response, Zoraal Ja assembled a party of warriors, and with them confronted and felled the beast. It was interesting to hear of the king's feat in the past.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SYSTEM_100_111<tab>Your exchange with the fresh-faced Tonawawta has taught you about “a battle with a tural vidraal.”
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_CITIZEN05246C_200_111<tab>What a battle it must've been, between the king's men and the tural vidraal. And all without regulators, too...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_115<tab>I'm sorry, but I couldn't find out anything useful. None of the people I questioned had heard of a Mamool Ja woman before...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_120<tab>Ah, you're back too! I told Shale all about your search.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALPHINAUD_000_125<tab>While I failed to learn anything directly related to Gulool Ja's mother, I did find information which may shed some light upon Zoraal Ja.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALISAIE_000_130<tab>Lamaty'i didn't seem to have much luck. How did you fare?
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_KRILE_000_135<tab>Zoraal Ja rarely made public appearances, so the people had no idea how he spent most of his time. Yet I believe therein lies the key to the answers we seek.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GRAHATIA_000_140<tab>Solution Nine is vast indeed. Even with the teleporters, we could cover but a small portion of it.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_100_200<tab>Gulool Ja has told me all. We've previously tried to track down records of his mother, but came up empty-handed.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_100_201<tab>With everyone's help, hopefully we can get somewhere this time...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_100_202<tab>Ah, so you spoke with quite a few different people as well. Let's combine all our findings and see what conclusions we might draw.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_200<tab>So, Zoraal Ja brought a retinue of Landsguard to Yyasulani, among whom was a female Mamool Ja.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_201<tab>His mission was to rid the region of a tural vidraal, and I believe it safe to say that that was the “crisis” in Yuweyawata he resolved.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_202<tab>If some of his troops stuck around for a time, perhaps to assist the villagers with recovery efforts, then they could've indeed gotten trapped in the dome.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALISAIE_000_205<tab>We also heard stories about the settlement in Yuweyawata. People lived there until nearly a decade ago, and Zoraal Ja made regular visits.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALPHINAUD_000_209<tab>If he required secrecy, a location home to his most loyal followers would be ideal. And if this Mamool Ja woman had remained there, they would have had occasion to come in contact.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_210<tab>I see. But what could Zoraal Ja have been doing in that village?
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_KRILE_000_211<tab>I think we can answer that question.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_KRILE_000_212<tab>In order to retrace Zoraal Ja's steps, Raha and I spoke with a researcher who worked at Origenics.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_KRILE_000_213<tab>He said that, approximately twenty years ago, a number of his colleagues were transferred to a research facility outside Everkeep─per the king's direct order.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_214<tab>This is the first I've heard of such a facility. Only Vanguard was believed to have been under the king's jurisdiction...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GRAHATIA_000_215<tab>It was apparently being used to develop a new kind of weapon, but I'm afraid that was all we could learn.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_216<tab>It's plenty to go on. Even if the work there was classified, any materials and equipment needed would have been manufactured within Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_217<tab>So if we look into transportation records...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_218<tab>There it is.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_219<tab>The routes are full of detours and attempts at obfuscation, but large deliveries were being made to Yuweyawata. Far too large for a mere village.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_220<tab>There hasn't been any activity for years, though. It's likely the facility has been decommissioned.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_221<tab>Do you think that's where my mother was?
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_222<tab>We can't say for certain just yet, but I reckon there's a good chance!
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_223<tab>This is amazing! Even though no one remembers her, you managed to figure all of this out!
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GRAHATIA_000_224<tab>Each piece of the puzzle may reveal little on its own, but when we put several together, a picture begins to form.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GRAHATIA_000_225<tab>And even should memories fade, footprints remain to mark the path of those who walked before.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GRAHATIA_000_226<tab>A lesson I learned in another life.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_227<tab>So we'll be investigating this secret facility in Yuweyawata, then.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_228<tab>And this time, I want you to come along, Gulool Ja.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_229<tab>Yuweyawata is on the other side of the lake. To get there, you'll need to take a hover cargo from the driftdowns.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_230<tab>Alright. Thank you, Shale!
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SHALE_000_235<tab>Make your way to the driftdowns when you're ready. Kiluwsa will have a hover cargo ready for you.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_240<tab>We've seen how much has changed for the part of Yyasulani that's on this side of the dome. I wonder what it's like on the other...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALPHINAUD_000_245<tab>Someone would have noticed if Zoraal Ja traveled from the driftdowns. I expect he utilized a flying vehicle.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALISAIE_000_250<tab>The settlement in the outskirts─that was originally Tonawawtan as well, yes? I wonder if Yuweyawata is similar to it.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_KRILE_000_255<tab>While the researcher we spoke with remembered that he had colleagues, he couldn't recall details about any specific individuals. Not their names nor what they were like...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GRAHATIA_000_260<tab>Weapons developed in secret with the aid of devoted followers... Nothing good will have come of this.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_KILUWSA_000_265<tab>I'll remain nearby after dropping you off. Just let me know when you're ready to head back.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_300<tab>So the hover cargo will take us across the lake... I've never been over there before.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_301<tab>It's still inside the dome, so I don't expect it'll be too different from here.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_302<tab>We'll likely encounter dangerous beasts, so the rest of us will go first. You follow when it's safe to do so, alright?
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_303<tab>Alright. Be careful, everyone!
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_A1_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_A1_000_002<tab>Form a party and enter Yuweyawata Field Station.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_305<tab>I promised to look after Gulool Ja, but I've spent hardly any time with him. I'm going to make up for that.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALPHINAUD_000_310<tab>While I alone haven't seen much of the dome, I am no stranger to braving the unknown. I will not slow us down.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALISAIE_000_315<tab>I can't help but be reminded of our foray into Origenics. And of Cahciua...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_KRILE_000_320<tab>We've seen the havoc that Valigarmanda wreaked on Urqopacha. I wonder what this other tural vidraal might have left in its wake.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GRAHATIA_000_325<tab>If the facility was used to research new weaponry, then it will have had tight security. Even if it has been closed down, let us proceed with caution.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_330<tab>Don't worry about me. I'm good at hiding from beasts.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_KILUWSA_000_400<tab>I'll launch the hover cargo whenever you're ready. Just say the word.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SYSTEM_000_401<tab>Travel to Yuweyawata?
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_WUKLAMAT_000_600<tab>Teeshal Ja, you said her name was? I wonder what her story is...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALPHINAUD_000_605<tab>The villagers were likely monitoring the imprisoned tural vidraal at Zoraal Ja's behest. And at some point, they became involved in the research of souls...
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_ALISAIE_000_610<tab>Now that the danger is behind us, it's started sinking in just how unsettling this place is. Hard to believe it used to be a village.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_KRILE_000_615<tab>That you should be able to peer into the tural vidraal's past... I wonder what that implies for the beast's consciousness while it was sealed away.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GRAHATIA_000_620<tab>It seems this Kanilokka was in charge here. From your recounting, he was quite dedicated to Zoraal Ja.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_700<tab>I wish I could see into the past like you. Then I could see people who are gone.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_701<tab>Because there aren't any other Mamool Ja women here, for a long time I couldn't even imagine what my mother looked like.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_702<tab>But when I visited Tuliyollal and saw some, I was finally able to picture her in my mind.
TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_GULOOLJA_000_703<tab>And one day, I hope I can see what she actually looked like as well.

TEXT_KINGMG103_05246_SYSTEM_000_704<tab>You may now enter Yuweyawata Field Station with a party of NPC avatars. To make use of this feature, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trust<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
